name: Geometry Dash in Java
description:
Download JRE 11 here: Java download

This is a game that I recreated purely for educational purposes. This is the game that is built at the Geometry Dash Java series on my youtube channel here: 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQP4qSCj1eHMHisDDR4iPzw?view_as=subscriber

The source code is available to look at here:

https://github.com/ambrosiogabe/JavaGeometryDash

Press F2 to play the game, F1 to stop the game. More instructions will come in this readme.

The game is coded in Java, so as long as you have Java installed on your system, you should only need to unzip the file, click the jar, and (fingers crossed) it will work. View this Readme for instructions on how to start the game.

It is buggy, and has limited functionality. Enjoy :)
